page.title: 02Carla Meets Prime Minister.
page.content: On 10.5.85 I was told the exciting news - Iwas to meet the {first lady {Prime Minister.}I dressed in my Junior Red Cross uniform; navy skirt , white blouse and red tie . On the blouse sleeves there is a{Red Cross }symbol and the letters Perth and Kinross. At the City Hall a security man came with a photographer to take my photo for an {Identification Card,}then I was sent home but I was not allowed to go to school for{security reasons.}I return- ed at 6.25 p.m., showed my pass and was searched . Finally {Mrs. Thatcher} arrived. She put money in my collect- ion box. I put a sticker on her black dress. Mr.Thatcher refused one so the {P.M.}wore his too. Later I saw her on T.V. making her speech at the Scottish Conservative Party Conference, still wearing the two stickers I had given her. What a thrill it was!
